item.title: The foul food maker: best guess
The foul food maker: go figure

imsmd:title.imsmd:langstring: The foul food maker: go figure

imsmd:description.imsmd:langstring: This tutorial is suitable for use with a screen reader. Practise using simple words to describe the likelihood of everyday events. How likely is an event: certain, likely, equal chance, unlikely or certainly not? Answer some questions using these words and then build your own examples. Learn how to describe probability using fractions, decimals and percentages. Learn how to do sampling experiments and compare actual results with expected results.

imsmd:centity.imsmd:vcard: BEGIN:VCARD REV:2003-02-10T15:16:23+10:30 ADR:;;;Wellington;;;New Zealand ORG:CWA New Media URL:http://www.cwa.co.nz/ VERSION:3.0 END:VCARD

organization.title: The foul food maker: go figure

item.title: Start: The foul food maker: go figure

imsmd:description.imsmd:langstring: Use a vending machine to get an awful meal, eg fly soup, worm pasta or yucky duck. The machine serves a meal randomly from four slots. Work out the likelihood of getting each type of meal. Then choose a matching probability word: impossible, unlikely, equal, likely or certain. Run simple probability experiments. Compare actual results with theoretical probability. Look at data tables that describe probability using fractions, decimals and percentages.

imsmd:centity.imsmd:vcard: BEGIN:VCARD REV:2003-02-10T15:16:23+10:30 ADR:;;;Wellington;;;New Zealand ORG:CWA New Media URL:http://www.cwa.co.nz/ VERSION:3.0 END:VCARD

item.title: Start: The foul food maker: questions 1

imsmd:description.imsmd:langstring: Use a vending machine to get an awful meal, eg fly soup, worm pasta or yucky duck. The machine serves a meal randomly from four slots. Work out the likelihood of getting each type of meal. Then choose a matching probability word: impossible, unlikely, equal, likely or certain. Run simple probability experiments. Compare actual results with theoretical probability. Look at data tables that describe probability using fractions, decimals and percentages. Fill in the blanks with equivalent values.

item.title: Start: The foul food maker: questions 2

imsmd:title.imsmd:langstring: The foul food maker: best guess

imsmd:description.imsmd:langstring: Use a vending machine to get an awful meal, eg fly soup, worm pasta or yucky duck. The machine serves a meal randomly from four slots. Work out the likelihood of getting each type of meal. Guess which type of meal is most likely to be served. Make several guesses, then check your results from the random sample.
